element.hint: Get this from Armis -> Integrations -> API. Needs to be a separate secret for each instance, because refreshing the token revokes the last one.
element.label: api_secret

element.hint: This tag is attached to every export/update to Armis.
element.label: armis_import_universal_tag

element.hint: Maximum number of records pulled from query.
element.label: getd_max_records

element.hint: Start number for REST query for GETD. Iterates each time the query is run.
element.label: getd_record_i

element.hint: Set to string "TRUE" to allow data to push to Armis (live), set to "FALSE" otherwise.
element.label: push_data_to_armis

element.hint: This is the % of time (max value 1) that queue processing will occur. Every minute, processing will occur until this % of a minute has elapsed. For example, if set to 50%, then every minute it will do 30 seconds of processing and then stop.
element.label: runtime_percent

element.hint: This is the number of occurrences of a MAC that can exist within the entire CMDB before this integration assumes that it's a "virtual MAC". Virtual MACs are ineligible for linking to Armis.
element.label: virtual_adapter_mac_count_threshold
